p: As of late March 2019, the patient reported only 2 episodes of chest pain since July 2018. The last one occurred in early March 2019 and was associated with a significantly emotional event. The patient is still opioid free, for 10 months, and uses a premixed combination of high-dose CBD hemp oil and a low dose of THC (15:1 CBD/THC) or the recommended extraction (1.2:1 CBD:THC), as outlined above. There have been no changes to his medications.
